ygData.subject: Arch Mage Answers update
ygData.msgSnippet: From EQVault: On Next Arch Mage Answers I ve recently received emails from concerned Bards over the lack of answers pertaining to various issues surrounding
ygData.messageBody:
From EQVault:

On Next Arch Mage Answers
I've recently received emails from concerned Bards over the lack of answers
pertaining to various issues surrounding their respected class.
As you may know, early last month Abashi stated that the next Arch Mage
Answers update would be dedicated to the Bard class. We haven't heard
anything new on when this update would be posted, until recently when Abashi
made the following post:
GZ is currently writing up his next ArchMage Answers. By "currently"
I mean that I just went by his office and he was composing the document.
I imagine we'll have it up Soon(tm).
-Gordon
